prompt: Gravity reverses on Tuesdays. How have humans adapted?
response: We have an answer to this question.1) Humans have adapted to the 24-hour day by having a 24-hour sleep cycle. 2) Humans have adapted to the 24-hour day by having an irregular sleep cycle. 3) Humans have adapted to the 24-hour day by having a 24-hour work cycle. 4) Humans have adapted to the 24-hour day by having a 24-hour sleep cycle, an irregular sleep cycle or a 24-hour work cycle.
